analysis.description:
GenesisToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/35/0xee6be3671b9d6a129573d89fc72deb074e61d0ec.sol#96) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xee6be3671b9d6a129573d89fc72deb074e61d0ec.sol#205-217)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/35/0xee6be3671b9d6a129573d89fc72deb074e61d0ec.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/35/0xee6be3671b9d6a129573d89fc72deb074e61d0ec.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/35/0xee6be3671b9d6a129573d89fc72deb074e61d0ec.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
